title: Compulsive
description: Lies hurt. Lies destroy.But some lies protect. Gray Donovan is a compulsive liar using it as a defense mechanism to survive her shattered past.When she starts seeing therapist Daniel Harrison, she can no longer deny the truths that have plagued her for so many years. She must now stand and face them. Opening up to Daniel leaves her exposed and vulnerable. When her soul is bared to him, she can’t contain the attraction or the feelings he elicits.Daniel feels drawn to his new patient, but he knows he will have to fight it in order to resurrect Gray from her demons. His will and his judgment are tested as he battles his own doubts…and faces his own secrets.**Content Warning: Due to language and sexual situations, this book is intended for 18+ Only**
author: Lia Fairchild
